english: Specifies a single sample header for this browser
chinese: 指定此浏览器的一个示例标头。

english: For a complete list of response headers , see the
chinese: 有关请求标头的完整列表，请参见

english: Gets an array of header values stored in a header
chinese: 获取标头中存储的标头值数组。

english: Specifies a set of sample headers for this browser
chinese: 指定此浏览器的一组示例标头。

english: To replace the value of an existing header , use the
chinese: 若要替换现有标头的值，请使用
标头造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: The string to add to the pics - label header
chinese: 要添加到pics - label标头中的字符串。

chinese: 有关请求标头的完整列表，请参见

english: Select the column head to sort by component type
chinese: 选择列标头以便按组件类型排序。

english: Sets the specified header to the specified value
chinese: 将指定的标头设置为指定的值。

english: Gets or sets the font used for header captions
chinese: 获取或设置用于标头的标题的字体。

english: That represents the type of the soap header mapping
Gets the font used to draw the column header text
chinese: 获取绘制列标头文本所用的字体。

english: Header is sent as part of the http response
chinese: 标头是否作为http响应的一部分来发送。

english: Returns an enumerator of the stored transport headers
chinese: 返回存储传输标头的枚举数。
